context: Booking Holdings faced severe pandemic impact as travel collapsed. The company owns Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Recovery began with domestic and outdoor travel.

competitors.name: Expedia Group
competitors.notes: Major OTA competitor with Expedia, Vrbo, Hotels.com brands

competitors.name: Airbnb
competitors.notes: Alternative accommodations benefiting from preference for private stays

competitors.name: TripAdvisor
competitors.notes: Reviews and travel planning with booking capabilities

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Hotel and flight search with Book on Google options

competitors.name: Marriott/Hilton Direct
competitors.notes: Hotel chains pushing direct bookings with loyalty benefits

competitors.name: Trip.com Group
competitors.notes: Chinese OTA with global expansion ambitions

competitors.name: Hopper
competitors.notes: Mobile-first travel app with price prediction
